author: andrewk
msg: Updated version number on page to say recomended people be using
1.3.26 or later, and 2.0.39 or later because the earlier versions have security concerns that are fixed in these versions.

author: gstein
msg: There were some missing items from 2002, and it was hard to find
particular meetings. I reorg'd them for per-year sections, putting the
most-recent at the top of the page.
